# [Interview #468: TGS Signing Report - Tim Kington, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=468#9)

#### Question

Will we see what's going on at the Black Tower?

#### Brandon Sanderson

We'll see whether that fits in or not.
